p: The same effect is observed for E(OEO/CEO) emulsion which is noted to have maximum efficiency, with an inhibition rate over 100%, against all microbial species analyzed ( Figure 2E). The inhibitory effect varies (in case of application of 100 µL emulsion): S. aureus < S. flexneri < S. pyogenes < P. aeruginosa < C. albicans < E. coli < H. influenzae < C. parapsilosis < S. typhimurium. When 150 µL emulsions were used, the antimicrobial effect varies: S. flexneri < S. pyogenes < P. aeruginosa < S. typhimurium < C. parapsilosis < C. albicans < H. influenzae < E. coli < S. aureus.
